tstt_perk_farmermans_1.name: Summon Farmermans' Friends I
tstt_perk_farmermans_1.description: Summon your farm animals to your side to help you in battle. They will attack your enemies and provide support.
tstt_perk_farmermans_1.flavor: Farmermans' friends are always ready to lend a hoof or a paw in times of need.

tstt_perk_farmermans_2.name: Summon Farmermans' Friends II
tstt_perk_farmermans_2.flavor: Farmermans' friends are always ready to lend a hoof or a paw in times of need.

tstt_perk_farmermans_3.name: Summon Farmermans' Friends III
tstt_perk_farmermans_3.flavor: Farmermans' friends are always ready to lend a hoof or a paw in times of need.

tstt_mastery_farmermans.masteryDescription: Do great and powerful things via the might of Farmermans' Friends!
